overview: "This is Marco Spitoni's first CG short movie. Based on Star Wars universe, it's a sort of Imperial propagandistic commercial. It took him about one year to complete and features 3D models made from scratch by himself in 3DStudio 4.0, 3DStudio MAX 2.0/2.5, Media Studio 5.0, Autodesk Animator..
tagline: Do you think you can handle this?
title: Join the Empire
